xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/381374-Action Hero Biju 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/nQFi62nYw8CISzV0US6sb7v324v.jpg Biju is an honest policeman who fights the injustice head-on. In his pursuit to keep things under control and clean, he encounters a series of events and cases which test his authority, honesty and integrity. With a week to his wedding, what ensues is a heartfelt story of a cop sans the cinematic hype. Action Hero Biju
